name: 35 Steaks + Martinis
address: 4455 Paradise Road Las Vegas, NV  89169
review description: I had the seared sea scallops and my friend had the chicken. Although the food was excellent, the highlight was the Serrano Martini. The taste of muddled Serrano peppers combined with vodka, basil, syrup and sweet and sour was to die for. The staff was very accommodating and the ambiance was upscale with a casual charm. I will definitely be going again!

name: Addiction at Rumor Vegas Boutique Resort
address: 455 East Harmon Avenue Las Vegas, NV  89147
review description: It's amazing Addiction is not more popular. Small but cozy, Addiction is tucked in the corner of Rumor Boutique Hotel's lobby, overlooking the courtyard and pool. You get the feeling of dining in a Palm Springs or Miami resort -- no clanging slot machines or obnoxious music. The menu is mostly made of interesting takes on comfort food, served tapas-style. The service is attentive, relaxed and friendly. And because of its "hidden" nature, getting a table is as easy as walking right in.

name: Agave - Las Vegas
address: 10820 W. Charleston Blvd Las Vegas, NV  89135
review description: Agave continues to be my favorite restaurant in Las Vegas, hands down. The atmosphere and food are very authentic. I am a huge fan of the blue corn chicken enchiladas. Great food selection and a extensive tequila menu. This is truly one of those rare gems.

name: Alizé at the Top of the Palms Casino Resort
address: 4321 W Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV  89103
review description: Food was expertly prepared - execution was flawless.

name: America Restaurant - NYNY Hotel and Casino
address: 3790 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
neighborhood: New York New York Hotel & Casino
review description: Horrible service! Food was late on several occassions and the service was horrible!

name: Andre's at the Monte Carlo Resort & Casino
address: 3770 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Slightly overpriced in my opinion, but the experience was phenomenal. I loved the ambiance; very European in nature. Recommended if you are not in a hurry and want to have a truely French dining experience. I plan to return!

name: Annie's Gourmet Italian
address: 1716 W Horizon Ridge Pkwy Suite 100 Henderson, NV  89012
review description: There were some very odd tasting dishes for an Italian restaurant. Eggplant Parmigiana unusual taste & my sons dish was in a white sauce that was way too creamy.

name: Aquaknox
address: 3355 South Las Vegas Blvd. Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Third time there, third tome satisfied!

name: Artisan Hotel Boutiques’ Mood Restaurant
address: 1501 West Sahara Avenue Las Vegas, NV  89102
review description: We are locals and love this hotel. We love the bar and the ambiance of the bar. We've wanted to try the restaurant for a long time. Sadly, we won't go back here to eat. I will say that the bread basket was really good.

name: Aureole - Las Vegas
address: 3950 Las Vegas Blvd. Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: It was what we expected from a high end restaurant. Service and food was excellent.

name: B and B Ristorante
address: 3355 Las Vegas Blvd South The Venetian Resort Hotel and Casino Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Great meal as with everything Batali and Bastanich and the freshest of ingredients but do they all have to be on the same plate? The wait staff are all excellent and the wine list (all Italian) was incredible but expensive. They offer two choices , tasting menu or a la cart with a focus on selling you more courses than you can eat. I enjoyed the meal immensely. It is a great place for special occasions but next time I'm going to stick with a glass of wine an apertif and a primi. Oh yeah, I'll skip the $25 desert tasting too. It was mediocre and unnecessary.

name: B.B. King's Blues Club - Las Vegas
address: 3400 Las Vegas Blvd. Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: I wouln't recommend the food as it was just good, but the music and atmosphere was outstanding

name: Bacio - Tropicana Las Vegas
address: 3801 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Bacio proved itself to be an excellent restaurant. My boyfriend and I enjoyed everything we ordered. The only thing I was not a fan of was my wine but that wouldn't stop me from recommending it to others.

name: Baja Miguel's - South Point Casino
address: 9777 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89183
review description: It was an enjoyable evening. The only complaint I have is that I wanted a later reservation and on open table none was available. However as we were eating there it appears there were plenty of open tables when we left, which would have been the time we wanted to be seated. Otherwise a great place to eat.

name: Bar and Lounge Table Reservations - Cosmopolitan
address: 3708 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: This reservation was unnecessary. There was no host and we sat where ever we wanted. It was mid-week during a slow month. You might need a reservation on a busy weekend or holiday.

name: Barcelona Tapas & Bar
address: 10690 Southern Highlands Pkwy Las Vegas, NV  89141
review description: A great place to experience a variety of dishes, reasonably priced. Good wines.

name: The Barrymore - Las Vegas
address: 99 Convention Center Drive Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Great as always! from the service to the food, always consistently a good experience!

name: Bartolotta Ristorante Di Mare - Wynn Las Vegas
address: 3131 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Food was ok, but not worth the price.

name: Beach Cafe - Tropicana Las Vegas
address: 3801 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Dinner was excellent. Way more food than I could eat, however my 17 year old grandson devoured all of his quite nicely. The mile high chocolate cake for dessert was absolutely sinful, it was SOOO good. Food was served in a timely manner, was hot and as I said, excellent. The server was pleasant, cheerful and helpful For us, it was a great experience.

name: Benihana – LVH – Las Vegas Hotel & Casino
address: 3000 Paradise Road Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: We had a very enjoyable experience at Benihana. The food was very good, the place has a fun atmosphere and the service was excellent. The food portions are quite generous and we probably should not have ordered a sashimi appetizer but it was excellent so I am glad we did.

name: Beso Steakhouse - Las Vegas
address: 3720 S. Las Vegas Blvd. #260 Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The service was outstanding. The food was creative and amazing. The decor was beautiful. I will be back.

name: Biscayne - Tropicana Las Vegas
address: 3801 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Very good....but for those prices really need to be magnificent . The steaks were good just not to that level in my opinion.

name: Blue Ribbon Sushi Bar & Grill - The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
address: 3708 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The food was fabulous, even the fried chicken!

name: Bootlegger Bistro
address: 7700 Las Vegas Blvd Las Vegas, NV  89123
review description: Great service! Loved the piano player-he could play everything and anything by memory. A few too many screaming brats who could have been isolated by themselves in a place further away from the piano. However, overall a good dining experience based in good cuisine!

name: Border Grill - Las Vegas
address: 3950 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: Had an amazing brunch there. Server was so sweet and attentive and unlimited mimosas was truly unlimited. They made sure we never had an empty glass in front of us. We had one vegetarian in our party and there were so many options for her that even the rest of us meat eaters were tearing through. I would definitely go back the next time I'm in Vegas!

name: BOTERO – Encore at Wynn Las Vegas
address: 3131 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Had a wonderful dinner with my new family at this magnificiant restaurant. The Seafood tower is amazing, must as an appetizer.

name: BOTTLES + BURGERS by Double Helix
address: 440 S. Rampart at Tivoli Village Las Vegas, NV  89145
review description: Really surprised that the hostess actually checked me in. When I walked in she had a bit of attitude and didn't really care what name was on the reservation,as she grabbed menus and walked back without even looking at the computer. Besides that the waiter and bartender were very much on top of things, they made the experience better. loved the milk shakes and the burgers were pretty delicious to, I would recommend for more of a lunch outing rather then dinner.

name: Bouchon at The Venetian
address: 3355 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: I enjoyed the food, and the service was great. I will go back to Bouchon.

name: Brand - Monte Carlo
address: Monte Carlo Hotel & Casino 3770 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Average fine dining overall. "Crispy Rock Shrimp" appetizer was excellent; Caprese salad was also very good. However, the Prime Rib was nothing to write home about. Their specialty drinks were unusual and good, but not necessarily worth the price.

name: Bratalian Neapolitan Cantina
address: 10740 S. Eastern Ave #155 Henderson, NV  89052
review description: We've never had a bad, or even mediocre meal at Bratalian. The food is always fresh and delicious and cooked to perfection. The service is the best, and the ambience is quiet enough to hold a conversation with others at the table.It's a welcoming place and whenever we feel like an Italian meal Bratalian is at the top of our list.

name: Broadway Burger Bar and Grill
address: 3790 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
neighborhood: New York New York Hotel & Casino
review description: Good burgers, but service was okay.

name: Buca di Beppo - Excalibur Las Vegas
address: 3850 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Not impressed with the hostess. No smile and in rush to seat us which was odd because we had such an early reservation there was very few patrons waiting and eating. Our watitress was good overall!

name: Buca di Beppo - Las Vegas
address: 412 East Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV  89169
review description: Simply enjoyable... good food, service and friendly staff. It pays to pre-order for scheduled dining party.

name: Buca di Beppo - Summerlin
address: 7690 West Lake Mead Boulevard Las Vegas, NV  89128
review description: Always a good experience. The staff is accommodating, friendly, and on top of their game. Nice casual atmosphere.

name: Canal Street - Orleans Hotel & Casino
address: 4500 West Tropicana Avenue Las Vegas, NV  89103
review description: My guest and I both had Osso Bucco and it was delicious. Our waitress was very friendly and seemed to know the wine list by heart! We will definitely return.

name: Canaletto
address: 3377 Las Vegas Blvd. Suite 2440 Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: I have eaten at Canaletto a number of times and even sponsored several corporate events there.

name: Capital Grille - Las Vegas
address: 3200 Las Vegas Blvd South, Suite 3300 Fashion Show Mall Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: It was my first time at your restaurant, and I enjoyed it, very much! The ambiance was great! The music, lovely, and the food and service were, both, top notch! I will definitely come back...Only with a different date! ;) hahahhaha!

name: Carlos 'N Charlie's @ The Flamingo
address: 3555 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Way too loud and the food was mediocre at best. We were there in the afternoon and seated outside. If you don't mind yelling when having a conversation, this is place for you.

name: The Carmel Room - Rampart Casino
address: 221 N Rampart Blvd Las Vegas, NV  89145
review description: That was not my first visit, and will not be my last. Look forward to more of those delicious crab cakes and spinach salad.

name: CarneVino Italian Steakhouse - Palazzo Hotel
address: 3325 Las Vegas Boulevard South Palazzo Hotel and Casino Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Outstanding dry aged bone in ribeye. The beef cheek ravioli is delicious Service was perfectly attentive and pleasant. We'll definitely be back.

name: Carve - Eastside Cannery Hotel & Casino
address: 5255 Boulder Hwy Las Vegas, NV  89122
review description: Food was excellent, Prime Rib was exceptional, waiter was outstanding

name: Casa di Amore
address: 2850 East Tropicana Ave Las Vegas, NV  89121
review description: This is old style Vegas at its best, a hidden gem in Las Vegas. One of the best Italian restaurants in Las Vegas.

name: Central Michel Richard - Caesars Palace
address: 3570 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: When we arrived for dinner on a Thursday night, there were less than a dozen groups of patrons in the restaurant. We waited for over 15 minutes before a waitress came over to greet us. She was apologetic because she didn't know that our table was hers. We wanted to speak with a sommelier and that took another 10 minutes. By the time the sommelier showed up at our table, we were already frustrated with the service and had already decided to leave. 30 minutes in a restaurant and all we had was water.

name: Charlie Palmer Steak Las Vegas
address: 3960 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: The service was outstanding. We went with the cut of the week menu. The asparagus risotto was very bland. The soup, corn chowder with bacon, shrimp, potatoes was awesome! Veal Delmonico was good to great; wife's was stringy, mine was not. Dessert was very good.

name: Chart House Restaurant - Golden Nugget - Las Vegas
address: 129 East Fremont Street Golden Nugget Las Vegas, NV  89101
review description: A hidden gem located in the Golden Nugget

name: China Grill - Las Vegas
address: 3950 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: Was ready to pass after reading all the negative feedback on open table. But out dinner at the china grill was great. Still delicious. Bannanas in a box is the best thing ever

name: China Poblano - The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
address: 3708 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: It is an interesting idea to be able to order both Chinese and Mexican entrees. We tried pork dumplings, ceviche, and shredded beef and pork tacos, as well as chips and salsa. Everything was tasty and the salsa was especially good. But we had tried the chef's other Cosmopolitan restaurant, Jaleo, several days earlier and found the menu and taste superior.

name: Cili
address: 5160 Las Vegas Blvd., South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: This is the best lobster salad on the planet....a lovely view of the golf course too! Our waiter was most attentive! If you are looking for a great place for the ladies to lunch this is it!

name: Circo - Bellagio
address: Bellagio Hotel & Casino 3600 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Although the Bellagio does not list Circo in their "fine dining" category, it is every bit that. Food, service and atmosphere all made for a most enjoyable evening. The wait staff were not stuffy types, which just enhanced our enjoyment.

name: Comme Ca - The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
address: 3708 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: I had a fabulous meal with spectacular service! I dined solo and felt very comfortable. I'll be back!

name: Cortez Room - Gold Coast Hotel & Casino
address: 4000 West Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV  89103
review description: should not put family with loud kids near other tables

name: The Country Club - Wynn Las Vegas
address: 3131 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Everything was amazing I loved for the brunch , it is pricey but worth every penny x

name: CUT at The Palazzo Las Vegas
address: 3325 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The food was less that what I was expecting from the restaurant of this level, however, the service was spectacular. One thing that was quite bizarre was the choice of music they played and the level they played it at. Not something I would expect in a higher end restaurant.

name: D.O.C.G. - The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
address: 3708 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: This was our second visit to Las Vegas and our second trip to DOCG. We love the food, ambiance, service, and wine list. We have eaten at restaurants all over the world and would rank DOCG as one of the best. I will recommend DOCG to all of my friends travelling to Las Vegas.

name: Dal Toro
address: 3325 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The two girls at the check in area were not friendly. They seemed young and not in tune with customer service concept. The caprese salad was very good but the chicken dish did not have much flavor. Patio was nice in the evening. Music from Majic Island show was the background music.

name: Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steak House - Las Vegas
address: 3925 Paradise Rd. Las Vegas, NV  89169
review description: We had the most amazing dinner. It was our anniversary and the staff made us feel so uniquely special. The food was amazing as well as the special drink.

name: Delmonico Steakhouse
address: The Venetian Resort Hotel & Casino 3355 Las Vegas Blvd, South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Still one of the top steakhouses in Vegas. Steaks were wonderful and service was top notch.

name: Diablo’s Cantina - Monte Carlo
address: Monte Carlo Hotel & Casino 3770 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Average casual dining overall. Decent Mexican food. Drinks were not very good (Pina Colada and Margaritta were too sweet). Fun atmosphere.

name: DJT
address: 2000 Fashion Show Drive Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Was not particularly impressed. Menu was limited. They were out of the filet minion and we had to settle for the rib eye (which was excellent). Pasta was average. But the salmon was great as well. They have dumped the fixed price menu. So likely to be more expensive now. Overall given the choices available in Vegas I would not say there is anything standout about this place.

name: Don Vito's Italian - South Point Casino
address: 9777 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas, NV  89183
review description: Very nice restaurant; good food; lovely hostess; great wait staff.

name: Eiffel Tower
address: 3655 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Been there for our anniversary and now for our birthday. Both occasions where made special by the service, food, and atmosphere.

name: El Segundo Sol
address: 3200 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The food was definitely a notch above your average Mexican restaurant. The grilled vegetables were especially good, and so was the tableside guacamole. Those who got the pulled pork said pineapple was listed as a main ingredient on the menu, but was not detected in the dish. If you're there in the hot weather, there are misters which help to keep you cool.

name: Emeril's New Orleans Fish House
address: MGM Grand Hotel 3799 Las Vegas Blvd, South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The food was good but not exceptional for the prices. It took almost 90 minutes to be served our entree's after ordering. The portions were also very small. I expected more being an "emeril's" signature restaurant with his specialty of Louisiana style cooking. $295 for four people with one bottle of $50 wine was ridiculous with no appetizers, all entree's and one side dish of asparagus.

name: english's
address: 6599 Las Vegas Boulevard South Suite 210, Town Square Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: Was expecting a traditional tea but this is a mall restaurant with a casual atmosphere. It was fine for what it was.

name: ENVY The Steakhouse at The Renaissance Las Vegas
address: 3400 Paradise Rd. Las Vegas, NV  89169
review description: Good steakhouse north of the strip crowds. Beautifully decorated, great attentitive staff. I had a very good greek salad while DH had his usual wedge. shared a well prepared rib eye and usual accompaniments. Sort of pricey compared to other steakhouses of its quality, which are plentiful in Las Vegas. Very sad that the town is so depressed, we were only one of 3 couples there that night.

name: Ferraro's Restaurant & Wine Bar
address: 4480 Paradise Rd, Ste 100 Las Vegas, NV  89169
review description: Been going to Ferraro's since before it relocated. We've never ever had a bad meal or bad experience of any kind. It was our 32nd Anniversary and we chose to celebrate it here. That day's Chef's special included Dover Sole, a favorite of Diane's. In fact, she had been hoping it would be on the menu. Done perfectly and deboned at the table. I ordered the 8 oz filet which was cooked exactly as I ordered. And ... it really was Prime quality. I commented that it was either the best or second best I had in these past several years. We shared a half bottle of Cabernet with dinner. To top it off, they brought us an excellent slice of Tiramisu, unrequested and at no charge, for us to share for our Anniversary.All in all, the evening was splendid

name: Fiamma - MGM Grand
address: MGM Grand Hotel & Casino 3799 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: A great spot for after the comedy show as it's open a little later than the other restaurants in the MGM. Nice food, simply prepared and not over fussy. Service was efficient.

name: Fin - Mirage
address: Mirage Hotel & Casino 3400 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: I went to dinner on a Saturday night with a friend. We were seated promptly but our waiter didn't come until we flagged down someone. He let us know he couldn't find our waiter but would take our order and give it to her once she was found. The manager came to our table to apologize and picked up our soups. Two different waiters tried to take my wine glass before I ordered any. The food was good but not worth sitting through the sub par service. I don't think I'll be going back.

name: Firefly on Paradise
address: 3900 Paradise Rd, Suite A Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The food was pretty good. The waiter we had was nice enough, and the service was prompt, but he really needed a ittle more training when it came to the menu. He was a little weak in decribing the dishes, which is important when you are ordering several tapas, but other than that, we would go back and give it another try.

name: Firefly Tapas Kitchen & Bar Henderson
address: 11261 S Eastern Ave Henderson, NV  89052
review description: Enjoyed tasting different smaller things.

name: Firefly Tapas Kitchen & Bar West Sahara
address: 9560 W Sahara Ave Las Vegas, NV  89117
review description: Amazing number of unique plates -- all.very tasty. Comments about high noise level are true.

name: First Food & Bar
address: 3327 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: First is my favorite in Las Vegas! Always great food, wonderful atmosphere, top-notch service, and a memorable experience. Thank you!

name: Fix - Bellagio
address: 3600 Las Vegas Blvd S Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: This was one of my top five (5) meals. I was with my two nephews who thought the food was great.

name: Flame Steakhouse - El Cortez Hotel & Casino
address: 600 East Fremont Las Vegas, NV  89101
review description: the food was great and the service . the smell in casino to perfumeie smelled overly sweet cheap colonge love the hotel and building will be back work on that smell though .

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - Las Vegas
address: 8721 West Charleston Blvd. Las Vegas, NV  89117
review description: A wonderful experience! We decided to celebrate our 19th wedding anniversary with dinner at Fleming's and they did not disappoint. We were seated promptly upon arrival and the hostess, server and manager all wished us happy anniversary. Our server Brittany was excellent; fast, courteous, and knowledgeable. Our steaks were cooked exactly as we ordered and all the food came out hot. It was not freezing in the restaurant so our food actually stayed hot until the last bite. Fleming's has never disappointed and I am sure we will visit them again.

name: Fleur by Hubert Keller - Las Vegas
address: 3950 Las Vegas Blvd Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: The food at Fleur was very good. You expect pricey because of the chef, but it was respectable.

name: Gaetano's Ristorante
address: 10271 S. Eastern Ave #111 Henderson, NV  89052
review description: Excellent service and mouth watering food.

name: Gallagher's Steakhouse
address: 3790 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
neighborhood: New York New York Hotel & Casino
review description: Fabulous steaks!!!! Great service. A most enjoyable dining experience.

name: Garden of the Dragon - LVH – Las Vegas Hotel & Casino
address: 3000 Paradise Road Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: clicked on 5 stars but won not take. the staff is always friendly, maitr d is very nice and food great, service is fast or leisure

name: Garduno's
address: 4321 W. Flamingo Rd. Las Vegas, NV  89103
review description: I booked on line for reservation and we were seated quickly and the meal was great along with the excellent service. Thanks for a great dinning experience.

name: Garfield's
address: 2620 Regatta Drive Las Vegas, NV  89128
review description: Every time we've been to Garfield's, the food has been outstanding. Incredible flavors and beautiful presentation. We love being able to sit outside and enjoy a view that makes you feel like you're anywhere but Las Vegas. The quiet, unhurried atmosphere is perfect.

name: Giada's Italian Cucina
address: 2540 Anthem Village Drive #100 Henderson, NV  89052
review description: Finding a good restaurant not affliated with the "Las Vegas Strip" is wonderful. It was such a pleasure to dine at Giada's. Warm friendly servers an attentive owner and a great meal all added up to a very nice experience. We will return.

name: Golden Steer Steakhouse
address: 308 West Sahra Las Vegas, NV  89102
review description: Excellent service as always. Dinner salad was not very good. Poor quality lettuce and it needs some quality attention.

name: Gonzalez Y Gonzalez - NYNY Hotel
address: 3790 Las Vegas Blvd South, Suite 11 Las Vegas, NV  89109
neighborhood: New York New York Hotel & Casino
review description: I live in an area of the U.S. that has very good Mexican food, and while my expectations were not incredibly high for GyG, I still left a bit disappointed. The salsa with chips was good. We tried the enchiladas which were a bit tame on the heat side; would love more heat. My wife's chile rellenos were nothing but breading-- she was pretty disappointed when she finished and the plate was full of the breading. We both like crispy rellenos. The waiter was very inattentive, never filled waters, only came around after the meal was over. Might be a good place for lunch while on the strip, but go elsewhere for dinner.

name: Grotto
address: 129 E. Fremont Street The Golden Nugget Hotel and Casino Las Vegas, NV  89101
review description: Such a great place to eat. We go here every year with our kids.

name: The Henry - The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
address: 3708 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The staff weren't very attentive, and main course of salmon was over salted. The crab cake was good, but that was about the only positive note. From the good reviews I had read, I was disappointed in both the food and experience.

name: Herbs and Rye
address: 3713 W Sahara Ave. Las Vegas, NV  89102
review description: Surprising this is a very good restaurant with great happy hour specials. I will be going back. they need another server due to the amount of business but we had a great experience and will gladly come back

name: Hofbrauhaus - Las Vegas
address: 4510 Paradise Rd Las Vegas, NV  89169
review description: Great authentic German music, ambiance and beer, but food quality has always been poor (Schweinbraten meat was thin and dry, need more sauerkraut dishes and better dumplings).

name: Holsteins - The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
address: 3708 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Food was good and server was very knowledgeable of menu.

name: Hussong's Cantina - Las Vegas
address: 3930 S. Las Vegas Blvd, #121B Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: Food was just mediocre for waht we paid. Would not visit again at those prices.

name: Il Fornaio - Las Vegas
address: 3790 S. Las Vegas Blvd. Las Vegas, NV  89103
neighborhood: New York New York Hotel & Casino
review description: We never fail to visit Il Fornaio when traveling to Vegas. Food and service are consistently very good.

name: Il Mulino New York - Las Vegas
address: 3500 South Las Vegas Blvd Forum Shops, Caesars Palace Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: We were surprised that the first service of Pellegrino Water was on our bill at 16.00 per bottle. We were not told at service? Everyone was very disappointed. Every starter was that was ordered was to perfection. However, be careful we were served more than what was ordered. My husband ordered a special and we were not given market price. That entree was a whole fish prep in rock salt. The bill $62.00. Overpriced and would have not ordered. One veal entree was overcooked and gritty. A poultry entree was dark meat and dry. The desserts rocked.

name: India Palace - Las Vegas
address: 505 E Twain Ave Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Not so friendly or put together staff, took 15min for me to get my ice tea( just a regular ice tea...) When the food did come out it was amazing. Waiters never stopped by to check on us.

name: Jaleo - The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
address: 3708 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Creative tapas menu--everything we tried was incredible!

name: Jasmine - Bellagio
address: 3600 Las Vegas Blvd S. Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Jasmine is situated for a perfect view of the Ballagio's beautiful dancing fountains in a luxuriously appointed room, providing for one of the most romantic settings you can find for dinner, even in Las Vegas. We've been here several times over the years and have occasionally found the service a bit rushed or the food below par for the rather stiff price. But the latest trip was excellent all around and the food perhaps the best we've had since Ballagio opened. Bellagio remains the best rated hotel in town. Combine that with the heady atmosphere of Jasmine, and you are looking at a high bill. But if atmosphere matters, you'll get lots of value for our money.

name: Joe's Seafood, Prime Steak & Stone Crab - Las Vegas
address: 3500 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: reservation honored on time food and service excellent overall

name: Kabuki Japanese Restaurant - Las Vegas
address: 6605 Las Vegas Blvd South #147 Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: The best Sushi in Vegas, better than sushi Samba.

name: Kabuki Japanese Restaurant - Summerlin
address: 400 S. Rampart Blvd. #190 Las Vegas, NV  89145
review description: As Japanese restaurants go, I would say that Kabuki is in the upper 90% of the whole. Of course the restaurant is new so everything is new and clean and the service we received was great! It was a bit noisy but that is to be expected with the "younger" crowd. There was an "event" in the other half of the restaurant and taiko drums outside. Could have done without the drums. What we had of the food was great the the presentation was top notch.

name: Koi Restaurant and Lounge
address: 3667 Las Vegas Blvd. South (Planet Hollywood Resort) Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Koi Las Vegas is our favorite restaurant and we visit every Vegas trip - we always share several of the cold and hot appetizers, working our way through our favorites, and always take the recommedations for new items from our server. Our server on this visit was Sora and she is simply amazing!

name: Kokomos - Mirage
address: Mirage Hotel & Casino 3400 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Wendy is a true professional, give her a raise!

name: Kona Grill - Las Vegas
address: 750 S. Rampart Boulevard Fashion Village at Boca Park Las Vegas, NV  89145
review description: no brunch !!!! I reserved with open table based on the sunday brunch promotion that open table advertised. the fact is, kona grill does not offer a sunday brunch !!!

name: La Scala
address: 1020 E Desert Inn Rd. Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The restaurant had excellent reviews and was off the strip and that is why we selected La Scala. We were very pleased that we did for the value, ambiance, service and staff were absolutely the best. The menu was extensive and they even offered to make a dish off the menu if we wanted. The food was served piping hot and the four of us were all very pleased with each of our orders. We look forward for a return visit when back in Vegas..

name: Lagasse's Stadium - Palazzo Resort Hotel Casino
address: 3325 Las Vegas Blvd.  Ste #101 Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The restaurant is the ultimate sports bar and restaurant. The huge video screens and personal video screens make this the perfect place to see the big game. The food was a disappointment for me because we have been to a few of Emeril's restaurants and they were much better for food. My wife had pizza which she said was ok, but i did not like. We shared banana cream pie which was excellent as usual. I also had crab cake which was ordinary.

name: Lakeside - Wynn Las Vegas
address: 3131 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: They do everything well here. A varied menu with low key service and an exceptional view makes it a relaxing--and satisfying--dining choice.

name: Lavo
address: 3325 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Server Johnny very knowledgeable and efficient.Bread and meatballs fabulous !

name: Lawry's The Prime Rib - Las Vegas
address: 4043 Howard Hughes Parkway Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The food was excellent. The best prime rib that I have ever had.

name: Little Buddha Restaurant Sushi Bar & Lounge
address: 4321 West Flamingo  Rd Las Vegas, NV  89103
review description: Went for a nice dinner and received bad service. The waiting staff keep stopping by trying to take out plates and the up sale food and drinks. We felt rushed and didn't enjoy our time. Tables with large groups were there before us and after us. Didn't enjoy it.

name: Lucio Ristorante
address: 5900 W. Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV  89103
review description: There was a private party going on so that perhaps affected the service but no excuse for putting in the entree order along with the salads which meant both arrived at the same time. Also, when bread brought to table, no butter or oil or cheeese to go with it.

name: Lupo by Wolfgang
address: 3950 Las Vegas Boulevard, South Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: Lupo is always terrific. Jonny Pacheco and his staff do it right every time.

name: Maggiano's - Las Vegas
address: 3200 Las Vegas Blvd. South, Fashion Show Mall    Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Very good food and good service. We have a son with celiac disease, and this was one of the very few restaurants we visited during our 3 week stay in US that had a good gluten free menu.(Think it was the only time our son had pasta during these 3 weeks.)

name: Mandarin Bar - Mandarin Oriental Las Vegas
address: 3752 Las Vegas Blvd S Las Vegas, NV  89158
review description: We had reservations at the bar but arrived early and decided to have tea. IT WAS WONDERFUL. Super relaxing, chic, and romantic. We cuddled up on the couch, ordered tea and scones, and gazed at the stunning view. It was perfect!!!

name: Marche Bacchus
address: 2620 Regatta Drive Suite 106 Las Vegas, NV  89128
review description: Had a wonderful time. Great food, music, atmosphere. I would recommend this place to many of my friends.

name: Marrakech Moroccan Restaurant
address: 3900 Paradise Road, Suite Y Las Vegas, NV  89169
review description: Took yet another group of friends to Marrakech and they loved it. Interactive belly dancers and cous cous to die for. Spectacular, as always. They both want to come back!

name: Marssa at Westin Lake Las Vegas Resort & Spa
address: 101 MonteLago Blvd Henderson, NV  89011
review description: Fabulous restaurant. Been here many, many times and they never disappoint. Chef Fuji and Kaz continuously serves the bestsushi and the hot food by June is the best. We tried the Opaka paka and it was delicious.Will go back

name: Mastro's Ocean Club - Las Vegas
address: 3720 Las Vegas Blvd. South, Suite 244 Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: You can split everything and have plenty.The shrimp cocktail was really a HUGE prawn cocktail and delicious with super spicy horseradish.Bone-in filet was the best steak I have ever had (served on 400 degree plates) and their butter cake...wow. Save room for it!

name: Max Brenner  - Las Vegas
address: 3500 Las Vegas Blvd Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Great burgers and chocolate fondue.. Service is a bit below average

name: McCormick & Schmick's Seafood - Las Vegas
address: 335 Hughes Center Drive Las Vegas, NV  89169
review description: We were celebrating a Birthday had a group of nine with three small children along. The waiter was excellent and attentive. I made a note when I booked regarding the Birthday and the menus came out printed with a special message to the Birthday boy, plus one tied in a ribbon for him to take with. We were all pleased with our food and everyone enjoyed the evening. The Parmesean Crusted Sole w/ Orzo was fabulous!!! Even the usually picky kids were happy with their food.

name: Michael Mina - Bellagio
address: Bellagio Hotel & Casino 3600 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Had the tasting menu. It was excellent. Taste and portion size were perfect

name: Michael's - South Point Casino
address: 9777 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas, NV  89183
review description: What an amazing dining EXPERIENCE. Wonderful food service and ambiance. One of my best dinners ever.

name: Mint Indian Bistro
address: 730 East Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: My husband and I went here to celebrate our anniversary. From the moment we walked in, we felt we had discovered a hidden gem: tucked away in a non-descript strip mall was this magical restaurant! First of all, the service was impeccable, and every employee we interacted with took the time to wish us a happy anniversary. But the real star was the food; anyone who is passionate about organic food knows that great organic food at a reasonable price can be a challenge to find. I would recommend Mint Indian Bistro to anyone!!

name: Mix - Las Vegas
address: 3950 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: Food is very good and the view at night is superb.

name: Mizumi - Wynn Las Vegas
address: 3131 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: This restaurant is gorgeous! We had a lovely table beside the waterfall and it was spectacular! Then the food....beautifully presented and delicious, Out waiters were excellent....attending to every detail. This is a special place for very special dinners! Can't wait to go again!

name: Mon Ami Gabi - Las Vegas - Main Dining Room
address: 3655 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Several friends and I went for breakfast. We were seated promptly and had an outstanding view!! The market berry pancakes were amazing! We also had the quiche and it was exceptional. The waiter was very friendly and prompt. Great, great breakfast place!!!

name: Morels French Steakhouse & Bistro - Las Vegas
address: 3325 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: WE WERE A PARTY OF 5 AND ENJOYED THE COMPANY VERY MUCH, WE ENJOYED SO MUCH WE WENT FOR BREAKFAST THE NEXT MORNING!!! WE WERE STAYING IN THE PALAZZO HOTEL, BEAUTIFUL

name: Morton's The Steakhouse - Las Vegas
address: 400 East Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV  89169
review description: Party of 4 and everyone enjoyed their dinner

name: MOzen - Mandarin Oriental Las Vegas
address: 3752 Las Vegas Blvd S Las Vegas, NV  89158
review description: The Bento Box Dinner, a selection of 6 small plates from a very large list of Asian dishes was excellent. The atmosphere is elegant but relaxed and the service excellent. Just what you would expect from a Mandarin Oriental restaurant.

name: Mundo Restaurant
address: 495 S Grand Central Pkwy Suite A116 Las Vegas, NV  89106
review description: Great place to go before a Smith Center performance. Will recommend it to others that I know go there. Our season tickets are for Sunday matinee, so we are not able to go to the restaraunt after those shows.

name: N9NE Steakhouse Las Vegas
address: 4321 West Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV  89103
review description: One of our favorite restaurants of all time. Every visit to Vegas includes a dinner at Nine. It is where I proposed to my futur wife.The food is an experience as well as the venue. Show up early and and spend time having a drink at the bar.

name: Nine Fine Irishmen - New York New York
address: New York New York hotel & Casino 3790 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
neighborhood: New York New York Hotel & Casino
review description: great food and service, have live bands at night, would definetly recomend for couples or groups

name: Nobu Las Vegas
address: Hard Rock Hotel, 4455 Paradise Road Las Vegas, NV  89169
review description: I have eaten at Nobu in San Diego and really enjoyed the food and service. My Las Vegas visit was acceptable (food still good) but the staff was very pushy, always trying to upscale, and not as focus on our experience for the evening. It left me wondering why we went to any effort eat here.

name: NOVE Italiano
address: Palms Casino Resort 4321 W. Flamingo Rd. Palms Hotel Las Vegas, NV  89103
review description: great viewexcellent breadsalmon special was exscellentchicken alfredo with linguine was good but have had better

name: Onda - Mirage
address: Mirage Hotel & Casino 3400 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The pasta tatsted like rubber and the bacon was hard to chew. and the sauce for the bread was to hard to eat. the menu was not in englsih so I had no real idea what i was ordering.

name: Opa Restaurant
address: 2550 S. Rainbow Blvd Las Vegas, NV  89146
review description: Good Greek food in Las Vegas has been difficult find, but this is one with authentic ambiance and food. The adorable waitress was efficient, knowledgable and willing to make suggestions.Our guest had never eaten Greek food before, so the sampler was a great choice. It consisted of dolmades, roast leg of lamb, meatballs, mousaka, gigantes, potatoes and vegetables. A great way to experience tastes of Greek food. Other foods sampled included flaming Saganaki, Greek salad, vegetarian combo, and grilled chicken breast served with lemoned potatoes and vegetables.A very nice meal was enjoyed by all. I believe that there is music played on certain nights, but the weeknight we were there there was no music, thus it was a nice quiet dinner.

name: Opus Too
address: 2350 Corporate Circle, 2nd Floor Henderson, NV  89074
review description: FIRST DAY FOR THE TRAINEES AND THEY DID A GREAT JOB.

name: Origin India Las Vegas
address: 4480 Paradise Rd. Las Vegas, NV  89169
review description: I am a huge fan of Indian food. I have eaten at some of the top rated Indian restaurants in NYC and London. Origins is now at the top of my list. There were three of us and we each ordered something different. Each dishes flavors were so unique. Lamb, chicken and fish were each done perfectly. The fish melted in your mouth. The lamb was succulent and the chicken divine. Our waiter, Abel, provided us with superb service and recommendations.The next time I am back in Las Vegas I am going here the first night so that I can go the second night too. It is that good.

name: Oscar's Steakhouse - Las Vegas
address: 1 S. Main St Las Vegas, NV  89101
review description: We truly enjoyed our evening at Oscars! Keep up the great work!! Only downer...Oscar wasn't on the scene. Oh well, I know he doesn't LIVE there!!! :)

name: Otto Las Vegas
address: 3355 Las Vegas Blvd South The Venetian Resort Hotel Casino Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: A little above the average las vegas casino restaurant. Pretty good, with good people watching values as well. Just a overall good place very good selection of Italian wines.

name: Overlook Grill - The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
address: 3708 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: We had a great lunch and there were 13 of us. Manager and server did a great job

name: Oyster Bay Seafood and Wine Bar
address: 3663 Las Vegas Blvd South Suite 560 Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Nice place with decent selection of seafood and pastas.

name: Palm Restaurant - Las Vegas
address: 3500 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Waiter Dutch was very helpful and courteous. Enjoyed his service very much.

name: Pampas Las Vegas
address: 3663 Las Vegas Blvd South #610 Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Excellent meat selection with frequent service.

name: Pamplemousse Le Restaurant
address: 400 E. Sahara Avenue Las Vegas, NV  89104
review description: This is one of my favorite restaurants in Las Vegas. The food is wonderful and the waiters are friendly with great personalities! The vibe is calm and cozy. Great for date nights.

name: Panevino Ristorante
address: 246 Via Antonia Ave Las Vegas, NV  89119-3527
review description: The staff is attentive. The food is excellent. The view of the strip at night is amazing. We had a wedding dinner there and everything turned out perfect. We do not visit Vegas often, but when we do we eat here as often as possible. See you in November.

name: PBR Rock Bar & Grill
address: 3663 Las Vegas Blvd S. #730 Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: I work as a concierge at the Green Valley Ranch Resort in Henderson, NV (20 minutes from the Las Vegas "Strip"). I use Open Table to make restaurant reservations on a pretty consistant basis. I use my point redempion checks to experience different dining locations so I may make recommendations to my guests. I made reservations through Open Table for 5:30pm on July 8th at PBR Bar & Grill for my girlfriend and myself. It's a casual place and the service and food was fine but when I wanted to pay with a $50 Open Table check I was told (by my server and the manager)it was not accepted there. It was my understanding that those checks are good at ANY participating restaurants. Is there any reason why this happened? Thank you.

name: Petra Greek Taverna
address: 440 S Rampart Blvd #180 Las Vegas, NV  89145
review description: Repeat customer. The food is always excellent and the staff is always over and above. Wanted to try the octopus but unfortunately not available that night. Will try next time.

name: Picasso - Bellagio
address: 3600 Las Vegas Blvd S Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: we ate outside and had a great view of the fountains!

name: Pinot Brasserie
address: 3355 Las Vegas Blvd. So. Las Vegas, NV  89113
review description: We had a party of 7, and the side room offered a great spot to dine and talk.

name: PJ Clarke's - Las Vegas
address: 3500 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Wonderful dining experience. 7 diners, each with a different entree, each raving about the quality of the food.

name: Postrio - Las Vegas
address: 3355 Las Vegas Blvd., South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: I was not impressed by the food. The pizza was dry and the steak was overpriced. Would not go back. Definitely sticking to Spago next time.

name: Primarily Prime Rib - South Point Casino
address: 9777 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89183
review description: The food, as always, was excellent. My group all had the prime rib and each was done exactly as ordered.

name: The Prime Rib Loft - Orleans Hotel & Casino
address: 4500 West Tropicana Avenue Las Vegas, NV  89103
review description: took our good friends there/// they loved it/

name: The Pub - Monte Carlo
address: Monte Carlo Hotel & Casino 3770 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Great place! The food is almost as good as the beer selection, Which is phenomenal. Our service was great, Joae took great care of us. We will be back next time we are Las Vegas.

name: Public House
address: 3355 S. Las Vegas Blvd. Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: My husband and I are beer geeks. We were in Las Vegas for my husband's birthday and he chose Public House for his birthday dinner because he heard they have a great beer selection. While this turned out to be true, we were disappointed that the server knew very little about the beers, after beginning her welcome by celebrating their beer prowess! We had to correct her on several occassions and she was not very attentive. The food, though not plentiful, was good but not great. My filet was cooked perfectly, and the cheesecake dessert was interesting. With all the amazing restaurant choices in Vegas, I would not go here again.

name: Red Square - Las Vegas
address: 3950 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: Again, this restaurant continues to be the largest gem in the crown for China Grill Management. Wiatstaff, chef, and the quality of food is truely the best in Vegas. The exceptional happens: While the Testing Menu was almost perfect, we ordered off the menu. The waitstaff still continued to bring the complimentary parts of the tasting menu with our meal. Outstanding. not expected and truely normal for this restaurant.

name: Republic Kitchen and Bar
address: 9470 S. Eastern Ave Las Vegas, NV  89123
review description: Drove from Aliante to Henderson because they had a "puff taco" the inside if the taco was very good and I would go back but.......it was NOT a puff taco. A word to the chef: If you have something on your menu, make sure it is a correct description. A "Puff taco" has the shell deep fried not rubbed in oil on a grill. HENCE.........PUFF taco. it puffs when fried!

name: Rhythm Kitchen Seafood & Steaks
address: 6435 South Decatur Blvd Las Vegas, NV  89118
review description: We had been looking forward to going here for some time, as Canjun food is a favorite. The Bar-B-Que Crawfish and Avocado appetizer was excellent and the Catfish we all had for dinner was good. But the server seemed often confused and forgetful. Also the bar service was very slow and it cost them the exra drinks we would have had if we had been served promptly.

name: Ricardo's
address: 4930 W. Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV  89103
review description: Food, as always was delicious, served at the right tempurture....after more than twenty years still GREAT!!! Our server,Sacramento, like all personnel seem to really enjoy their job, making the experience pleasant from the front door to the bat to the dining room.

name: Rick Moonen's RM Seafood
address: Mandalay Place 3930 Las Vegas Blvd. South S Suite 134 Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: Food was overpriced and quite mediocre, service was totally lackadaisical. It took 45 minutes after I requested the check before the waiter finally brought us a receipt to sign so that we could leave. Would definitely give this a pass, there are countless cheaper/better meals on the strip.

name: Ron's Steakhouse - Arizona Charlie's Decatur
address: 740 S Decatur Blvd. Las Vegas, NV  89107
review description: On our last trip to Vegas for our co-ed wedding party celebration we wanted to find a good steak house off the strip. WOW did we find a gem. Food was excellent,service was outstanding. They even cooked a plate off the menu for my friend who was Vegan. I would highly recommend this Steak House.

name: Roy's Las Vegas - Flamingo
address: 620 E. Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: All around good experience. Food and service were great.

name: Roy's Summerlin
address: 8701 W. Charleston Blvd. Las Vegas, NV  89117
review description: New shrimp and peach salad is great.

name: Sage - Aria
address: Aria Hotel & Casino 3730 Las Vegas Blvd Las Vegas, NV  89158
review description: I had been to Sage a year ago and had an outstanding meal. This time, not good at all. Oversalting was a major issue, and service was adequate but a bit disinterested. Also, despite being a farm-to-table restaurant, I noticed that the menu had not changed much at all and there were no daily specials. I don't know if there have been staff changes, but I may not run back unless I hear much more positive reports.

name: SC Prime Steakhouse - Suncoast Hotel & Casino
address: 9090 Alta Drive Las Vegas, NV  89145
review description: Another visit to the SC Steak House and no complaints. Our server Brenda was superb and they did a good job of keeping the ice tea glasses topped off. That is one of our main complaints concerning service in Las Vegas. We tried the special and it was just out of this world. Will return VERY soon!

name: Scarpetta - The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
address: 3708 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Lovely place. Excellent food.Service was not up to the standard of the food. The manager knew what he was doing, but it wasn't the case for our waiter. Very simple fix, staff need to appreciate that at a restaurant of Scarpetta's calibur, the customers shouldn't be looking around for the waiter to bring water, bread, and wine refills.

name: SEA Vegas: The Thai Experience
address: 3645 Las Vegas Blvd South Bally's Hotel and Casino Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Great food.

name: Senor Frog's Las Vegas
address: 3300 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: I celebrated my 72nd birthday at Senor Frog's. We live in Fla but had heard aboutSenor Frog's from our children who do extensive traveling.THIS OLD GRANDMA OF 72 WAS OUT IN THE CONGO LINE HAVING A BALL!!!!!!!!!WHAT A FUN GROUP. OUR SEATING WAS SUCH THAT WE COULD WATCH THE PIRATE SHIPAS IT ROUNDED THE CORNER (TREASURE ISLAND, LAS VEGAS, NV)OTHER ENTERTAINMENT: A BEAUTIFUL GREEN AND RED HUMMINGBIRD FLYING OUTSIDE OFOUR WINDOW!!Would we recommend Senor Frog's? YOU BET!!!!

name: Sensi - Bellagio
address: Bellagio Hotel & Casino 3600 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Love the kitchen with sound proof floor to ceiling glass walks in the centre of the restaurant. There is a small dress code. A man in t-shirt without sleeves was told he could sit at the bar and enjoy the same menu but would not be seated in main restaurant just around the corner. There were others with tailored shorts and short sleeved t-shirts. Liked that. Menu had columns showing the various types of food ranging from Italian to sushi so can mix up your meal. Naan bread and poppadums brought to table as your bread, lovely. Sushi rolls delicious. All food good. Service very attentive. Had a great evening and is on our list of favourite places for Vegas.

name: Shibuya - MGM Grand
address: MGM Grand Hotel & Casino 3799 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Great japanese. Try out one of the tasting menus or go for 4 cold / hot shared platters.

name: Shizen at the JW Marriott Resort & Spa
address: 221 N. Rampart Blvd. Las Vegas, NV  89145
review description: It was. A very enjoyable.d We both. Have. Already. Recommended. To our. Friends. The chef put on quite. The show.would go again the. Food. Was really good.

name: Siena Italian Trattoria
address: 9500 W Sahara Ave Las Vegas, NV  89117
review description: Great service this time around! Ask for Todd

name: Silverado Steak House - South Point Casino
address: 9777 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89183
review description: We had been looking forward to dinner here for a year since our last visit. It did not disappoint! Looking forward to next year!

name: Simon @ Palms Place
address: 4381 W Flamingo Las Vegas, NV  89103
review description: jessica was super great thank you

name: SINATRA – Encore at Wynn Las Vegas
address: 3131 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: We got ribeye, lobster risotto, and the filet mignon special. We liked all three but the ribeye was the best. We got asparagus as a side dish and didn't feel that it was worth $12 or whatever we paid for it. It wasn't enough for 2 people. The bread basket was nice, especially the crispy crackers. The Sinatra special cocktail with blackberries was really good also, as was the non-alcoholic version. The fruit tart and chocolate trio were excellent. If we went again we would ask to be in the main dining room because we couldn't hear the music in the wine room.

name: Slice of Vegas
address: 3930 Las Vegas Blvd South Ste 120 Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: Good menu selections beyond pizza. Pizza very good, but expensive compared to similar places in Las Vegas. Excellent bar drinks and nice locale in the Mandalay Place shopping area.

name: Smith & Wollensky Steakhouse - Las Vegas
address: 3767 Las Vegas Blvd Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The food and service were tremendous. Julian was our waiter and did an outstanding job. We had the table off the kitchen, which was wonderful as we were celebrating a special occasion. Many of the Vegas steak restaurants try to get the NY feel, but Smith's does it well. We lived in NY for 15 years, and it made us feel right at home.

name: Social House
address: 3720 S. Las Vegas Blvd. South #241 Las Vegas, NV  89158
review description: The basic rolls are sub par, and I wouldn't recommend the sashimi - we didn't have any, but based on the fishy flavour of the salmon in the Salmon Avocado roll, the sashimi won't be the freshest. I'm biased as I'm from Vancouver and a hole in the wall sushi joint can deliver Nobu-esque quality.

name: Spago - Las Vegas
address: 3500 Las Vegas Boulevard, South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: We have been going to this restaurant for 17 years now. The food is still INCREDIBLE. I had the halibut and my husband had the short ribs. Both were so tasty and beautifully presented. We also had salads and the chocolate souffle, which was AMAZING! Our server, Matt was very nice and attentive. Overall an incredible experience! I would highly recommend it for special occasions, or if you can afford it--every week!!!

name: Stack - Mirage
address: Mirage Hotel & Casino 3400 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Fun environment, good food, sharable...

name: Steak House - Circus Circus
address: Circus Circus Hotel & Casino 2880 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: This is my third times at "The Stake House." I still like it! Looking forward to visit it again in February 2013.

name: STK - The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas
address: 3708 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Wonderful service excellent dinner

name: Strip House - Las Vegas
address: 3667 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Taking in to account everything over all, Striphouse was "just ok". Service was alright not awful and our waiter was courteous. However, he did not hear one of our orders and we ended up waiting a while to receive it. By the time we did, out steak was cold and my husband was nearly done with his meal. Now to the food. We ordered the 28 day dry aged rob eye. Against better judgement and because of our waiters suggestion, we ordered it medium well. It came out VERY DRY and tough. I had a hard time cutting throughy steak. Also,the steak was very over seasoned and salty. Needless to say i was very disappointed. No wonder this place was empty on July 4th at 9 pm.

name: STRIPSTEAK - Mandalay Bay - Las Vegas
address: 3950 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: An outstanding meal at Strip Steak at Mandalay Bay. The sommelier recommended a wonderful cabernet to accompany our entree selection. Service provided by Steven was excellent.....perfect level of attention without being overbearing. Green salad and corn chowder were good starters and we both opted for Wagyu been entrees which were a perfect medium rare, as ordered. The quality of the meat was out of this world.,,,melt in the mouth good. Creamed spinach was the only disappointment...not bad but not up to the standards of the rest of the meal. Shared a delicious molten chocolate desert which would have been too rich for one person. Would recommend to others and would definitely return.

name: Sugar Factory
address: 3655 Las Vegas Blvd. Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: It was the best food ever. We were more than happy with all items that we ordered! Our only recomendation is pretty please open one in California! Lv is 8 hours from ous and can't go as offten as we would love... We had reservations for one night and ended up dinning there 3 more times before our trip was up!!!!! Love!! Love!! Love!!!

name: Sushi Roku - Las Vegas
address: 3500 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The manager stopped by our table on two occasions to wish my daughter a happy birthday and then again to take our photo with her birthday sparkler. The atmosphere was elegant and sophisticated --even with the birthday treat. We were delighted by the service and thrilled with the quality of the food. Sushi is a regular for us but Sushi Roku is outstanding.

name: SUSHISAMBA strip
address: 3325 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Excellent experience from start to finish. My wife and I had the dining experience of our lives! Food was fantastic and the service and attention from our server was top notch.

name: SWITCH STEAK – Encore at Wynn Las Vegas
address: 3131 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89103
review description: Loved our meal and the ambiance-please don't change it! Lance, our bartender, was fantastic!

name: Table 10
address: 3325 Las Vegas Boulevard South The Shoppes at Palazzo Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: My husband and I went to dinner here on a Tuesday night.I had pea shoot salad it was good,I had scallops for dinner.The scallops were the BEST I've ever had they were on top of corn and alittle bit of mashed potatoes.They were sweet tasting the scallops.I LOVED them!!!! My hubby had a filet cooked perfect.For dessert we had bannana cream pie it was to die for,it tasted so yummy!!!The service at first was alittle slow but it got much better.We will be returning here for dinner when we come back to Vegas.

name: Tao Restaurant and Nightclub
address: 3377 S. Las Vegas Blvd., Suite 2025 Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: I'll keep this short....

name: Taqueria Canonita
address: 3377 Las Vegas Blvd. Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Hardly memorable by the banks of the faux Grand Canal in the Venetian lobby, but decent and the staff try hard. Margarita was definitely the best item on the menu and the food was a decent average BUT nothing more. One of the cheaper options when staying in Las Vegas and better value than the other so-called budget dining options in the shopping center. No need to eat there more than once per visit to the hotel!

name: Tea Lounge - Mandarin Oriental
address: 3752 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89158
review description: Love everything about this place. Food, service, and location.

name: Technique at Le Cordon Bleu – Las Vegas
address: 1451 Center Crossing Road Las Vegas, NV  89144
review description: Overall excellence with low prices.

name: TENDER steak & seafood
address: 3900 Las Vegas Blvd South Luxor Hotel & Casino Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: Average. Expect more at $100+ per person

name: TJ's Steakhouse - LVH – Las Vegas Hotel & Casino
address: 3000 Paradise Road Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: We had the special which included salad, an entree, 2 sides and dessert. This was a good deal and enjoyable. If that had not been available I am afraid we would not have stayed to eat. Other than the special, strictly an a la carte menu but the sides started at 8.95, and steak options were limited. So a full meal with a rib-eye and sides, a glass of wine, dessert could easily top $100.00 pp. We saw people look at the menus and leave. For this venue, prices need to be a little more realistic.

name: Todd English P.U.B.
address: 3720 Las Vegas Blvd. S Las Vegas, NV  89158
review description: On our last trip to Las Vegas we visited the P.U.B and really enjoyed the oysers and chicken pot pie!

name: Todd's Unique Dining
address: 4350 E. Sunset Rd. Henderson, NV  89014
review description: Everything from sitting at the bar having a drink to leaving post dinner 4 hours later with a Thank You from everyone to us and from us to everyone was perfect.

name: Tommy Bahama's Restaurant & Bar - Las Vegas
address: 6635 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: Food and service are always superb

name: Top of the World Restaurant - Stratosphere Hotel
address: 2000 Las Vegas Blvd S Las Vegas, NV  89104
review description: The view from the Top of the World is absolutely spectacular, especially when you manage your reservations to make sure that your dining experience includes sunset. The food and service very much held their own when compared to that view, even though some reviews on this site have commented otherwise. My fiancé and I each had the 10oz Filet as part of our meal (she had the tasting menu with wine pairings, I had the Turf & Quack), and we both agreed that it was one of the best steaks we have had at any restaurant in a long time. The service staff was very helpful and attentive without being intrusive. The band playing in the lounge overhanging the dining area added to the atmosphere. All in all a wonderful and unique experience.

name: Trevi
address: Forum Shops Caesars Palace 3500 Las Vegas Blvd. S. Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Trevi has a fantastic menu and great ambience. You can sit inside for a quiet, intimate dinner, or eat on the patio and enjoy the fountains and foot traffic of the Forum Shops. The staff is friendly.

name: Tuscany Gardens - Tuscany Suites & Casino
address: 255 E Flamingo Rd Las Vegas, NV  89169
review description: I have been eating here for years. The food is better than ever.

name: Twin Creeks – Silverton Casino
address: 3333 Blue Diamond Road Las Vegas, NV  89139
review description: The food was all very good to great. The service was a bit annoying. They came around too often asking if we were done as if they were trying to get us out of there as quickly as possible.

name: Twist by Pierre Gagnaire - Mandarin Oriental Las Vegas
address: 3752 Las Vegas Blvd S Las Vegas, NV  89158
review description: The Mandarin Oriental is the perfect setting for this amazing eatery. The hallway leading to the restaurant is majestic. We were immediately greeted by the bartender, receptionist and maitre-di. The bartender was so friendly and recommended a kick to my usual drink. We had some great conversations, admired the interior design and then she escorted us to our table.

name: Valentino
address: 3355 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Valentino has top notch food. Their squid ink pasta and lobster verges on a religious experience. The wine list is extensive, with excellent selections, though it is haphazardly organized and, in the case of certain bottles, laughably over-priced. We dined early, 530pm, and we got the impression that some of the early-shift staff were a bit young but they were dedicated to their work in the service industry and made every attempt to make us comfortable. The major downside to our experience was the deafeningly loud construction we heard from just outside the front of the restaurant. Once this construction work is complete, we'd consider Valentino's a 'do not miss' level priority of the Vegas experience.

name: Ventano
address: 191 South Arroyo Grande Henderson, NV  89012
review description: Overall a very pleasant experience. Great food at a good price with a wonderful view-what more can you ask for! Please keep up the good work! Thanks you!

name: Verandah
address: 3960 Las Vegas Blvd. South Las Vegas, NV  89119
review description: A beautiful breath of fresh air amongst the over-the-topness that is Las Vegas. A true gem. Will definitely return and revommend to friends. Luxurious breakfast at reasonable price.

name: Via Brasil Steakhouse in Summerlin
address: 1225 S. Fort Apache Rd. Ste 100 Las Vegas, NV  89117
review description: This is the best of the meat-on-a-skewer @ your table Brazilian restaurants in Las Vegas, although it's hidden in a neighborhood off-Strip location. Inside is gorgeous, but the gourmet salad/soup bar & more than a dozen meats carved tableside are the main attraction. An extremely professional staff hover nearby to immediately bring more food, refresh your drink, refold your napkin when you return to the salad bar, or tempt you with dessert. This is my go-to place once or twice a month when I want outstanding food & service in a great atmosphere, including a water fall & glass wine enclosure. The new Sunday brunch is another reason for me to visit there more often. I get special offers as an E-club frequent diner. Via Brasil is a keeper!

name: Vic & Anthony's Steakhouse - Las Vegas
address: 129 E. Fremont Street The Golden Nugget Hotel and Casino Las Vegas, NV  89101
review description: Intimate dining for special occasions (for us anyway, since were seated upstairs, where there were only a few tables). Staff was friendly, and crab cakes were terrific!

name: Vino's Ristorante - Cannery Casino & Hotel
address: 2121 East Craig Rd Las Vegas, NV  89030
review description: I selected Vino because of the location and the fact that I had an OpenTable dining check. The introductory service was substandard as our drink order was not taken until about 10 minutes after we got there...mind u there were only 4 occupied tables. A table that was seated after us by at least a few minutes was attended to first and I don't believe the server ever introduced herself by name and definitely didn't mention any specials or suggestions. I was even more shocked during the delivery of the food, as I am a person that loves fresh grated parm and the server expressed her annoyance with it. Then when the check came it took the staff approximately 20 minutes to process the rewards check after we had already boxed our food.

name: Vintner Grill
address: 10100 W. Charleston Blvd. Suite 150 Las Vegas, NV  89135
review description: The service was very quick and responsive. Food excellent and prepared properly. Will come back.

name: Waverly's Steak House - Cannery Casino & Hotel
address: 2121 E Craig Road Las Vegas, NV  89030
review description: The service was only good because the poor treatment at the reservation desk offset the excellent table and waiter service.

name: Wing Lei
address: 3131 Las Vegas Boulevard South, Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: A transcendant dining experience. Superior and low key service and a sophisticated menu make this a highlight of any Las Vegas stay. Beautiful presentations of perfectly prepared items and a lovely space in which to relax and enjoy it. Not pretentious, just elegant and satisfying.

name: Wolfgang Puck Bar & Grill
address: 3799 Las Vegas Blvd South MGM Grand Hotel Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: We enjoyed our return trip to this restaurant. We had a lighter dinner which included the signature home made fries with blue cheese (excellent!) , a burger, and ravioli, both were very good. Service was also very good with good suggestions on cocktail choices. We'll return again when in the area.

name: Wolfgang Puck Pizzeria & Cucina
address: 3720 Las Vegas Blvd. South #240 Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: FIRST OF ALL, THE CITICENTER IS GORGEOUS, THE FOOD IS CASUAL BUT TASTE GREAT WE ENJOYED THE PIZZA VERY MUCH

name: Yellowtail - Bellagio Hotel
address: 3600 Las Vegas Blvd S Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Very expensive with very small portions although the food is very good.

name: Yolo's Mexican Grill
address: 3667 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: The food was quite good, interesting menu and a little different then the typical Mexican Restaurant. I had the Short Ribs which I'd recommend. The restaurant design/decor was nice, but the service was poor. The initial greeting was horrible. The hostess glared at us when we arrived and seemed put out she had to show us to seats. The waiter was okay, but very unattentive. We waited a long time for him to get our drinks order, in the end we went to the bar ourselves. It wasn't a bad evening despite that, but not a place I'd bother going back to. Too many other great Mexican places in Vegas.

name: Zeffirino
address: 3377 Las Vegas Blvd. So. Suite 2095 Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Probably better for larger groups rather than a couple.

name: ZINE Noodles Dim Sum
address: 3355 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89109
review description: Very good food, excellent service
